name: svg-png-converter-playground
description: TypeScript AST viewer and Advance Query editor

scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.build-dev-no-maps: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash  --no-source-maps
scripts.build-dev: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run build-only && rm -rf ../../../demos/docs/svg-png-converter/playground/* && rm -rf docs/static && mkdir -p docs/static && cp -r static/*  docs/static && mv docs/* ../../../demos/docs/svg-png-converter/playground/
scripts.build-only: export NODE_ENV=production && node --max-old-space-size=5000 node_modules/parcel/bin/cli.js build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report  --no-source-maps --public-url './'
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
